body_html: Thanks for the report! Note that the JIT is still unreleased, but of course feel free to play with it. The proper way to use it with nn Modules is to decorate the whole class, but it's still worthwhile to investigate this leak

body: Thanks for the report! Note that the JIT is still unreleased, but of course feel free to play with it. The proper way to use it with nn Modules is to decorate the whole class, but it's still worthwhile to investigate this leak
